item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Your privacy is important to us. It is vasthav.com's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, http://vasthav.com, and other sites we own and operate. We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent.
